app.Pages.title: Functionality Test
app.HomePage.page_subtitle: This test will assert that your experience using Pitchy will be optimal
app.HomePage.initialInstractions: To start the test please enter your contact informations below and press "start"
app.TestPage.thankYouLine1: Test is finished you can safely close this page
app.TestPage.thankYouLine2: Our CSM teams will contact you if any action is required on your side
